text: No Way Out (2004) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) for their SmackDown! brand. It took place on February 15, 2004 at the Cow Palace in Daly City, California. It was the sixth No Way Out event held by WWE. Eigjz matches happened on the event's card. The main event between Eddie Guerrero and Brock Lesnar for the WWE Championship was quoted by Kevin Sowers from PWTorch as being "one to remember for a long time". == Matches == ==References== == Other websites == *The Official No Way Out Website *No Way Out at In Demand.com Category:2004 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in California Category:WWE No Way Out Category:2004 in California Category:2004 in American television Category:February events es:WWE No Way Out#2004
title: No Way Out (2004)
